turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you order a coffee from Starbucks for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Which Starbucks? And what do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a large iced caramel macchiato from the Starbucks on FM78 in Converse

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. But the sizes are tall, grande or venti

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thats right, I want the venti size

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. Do you want it as it comes or with skim milk, coconut milk, soy milk, almond milk or the whole milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I like the whole milk. And can you ask for extra caramel sauce and whipped cream on top?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They can add the extra caramel drizzle and whipped cream. Do you want any sugar in it or other flavors? It has the vanilla syrup in it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, no extra sugar. Just the extra caramel.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Extra caramel drizzle, right? Or caramel syrup?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The caramel drizzle.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. So a venti iced caramel macchiato with extra caramel drizzle and add whipped cream on top, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. And can you tell them only a small amount of ice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will ask for little ice. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That is all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be $5.67

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fine. I want to pick it up on my way to the meeting.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I placed the order and it will be ready when you get there. Just check in once you get to the drive thru.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK. Whats my confirmation code?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will send the receipt and confirmation via text to your cell.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Bye

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
